00046 #define PERIPH_RCR_OFF                     0x104 ///< Receive Counter Register.
00047 #define PERIPH_TPR_OFF                     0x108 ///< Transmit Pointer Register.
00048 #define PERIPH_TCR_OFF                     0x10C ///< Transmit Counter Register.
00049 #define PERIPH_RNPR_OFF                    0x110 ///< Receive Next Pointer Register.
00050 #define PERIPH_RNCR_OFF                    0x114 ///< Receive Next Counter Register.
00051 #define PERIPH_TNPR_OFF                    0x118 ///< Transmit Next Pointer Register.
00052 #define PERIPH_TNCR_OFF                    0x11C ///< Transmit Next Counter Register.

00054 #define PERIPH_PTSR_OFF                    0x124 ///< Transfer Status Register.
